messages.message: @Léo can you provide the config you used for enterprise and any specific settings you used for your project on AiHub ? . By default aihub uses msft-v3 and based on the project settings it could be using the new form recognizer model. Another config difference is that aihub by default uses `extract_all_layers` as `true`. Though looking at the image this shouldn't have any effect.
Hi @Gaurav Saini I double-checked and the profile setting in enterprise for that doc is:

@Léo based on the config, msft-lite is being used in the enterprise env. Have you enabled object detection(table/checkbox detection) for your aihub project ? The OCR models being used are different. Can you send me this doc, we can verify this.
@Léo verified it, v3 is giving wrong results as compared to lite. Though it seems to be an anomaly, since v3 is an upgraded version of lite and in almost all cases gives better results.
